title: Mordekaiser
body:
What do you think about Mordeâ€™s kit.

In my last game, Morde dealt 88k damage, healed for 55K, and who knows how much he shielded for within that area as well.

In the end, his team won the game because they had the champion mordekaiser on their team. All he had to do was flash banish my arc, and heal his way to victory.

replies.body:
Did you build grievous wounds? How about {{item:3194}} ?

Because those two items shut morde down big time.

I think his kit is full of counterplay, but his numbers are a bit too high. I only ever feel like I'm cheated by him if he has Rylai's + his passive procced, or Conqueror procced. His synergy with Rylai's and Conqueror is frustratingly strong, but I just remind myself that he's a Juggernaut. I wouldn't have a fun time if a Darius, Urgot, or Garen had gotten atop of me either, so why should Mordekaiser be an exception?

 Overall, I rather face Mordekaiser over any other Juggernaut because he gives more breathing room so long as you dodge the claw.
Posting about how easy Mord is to deal with when you main him with a 65% winrate is a bit shady....

Are you sure it's not that you're team comp was horrible, you and your top fed. Like they were going to win if there top was darius or someone else.

Like this shows you have no clue wtf to do vs mord  "All he had to do was flash banish my arc, and heal his way to victory." Like you know the adc isn't everything right?  You know the enemy is down a player also right? You know your neeko and it's basically impossible for a mord to kill you right? Especially with that build right? Like you know you didn't have %pen in a 40 min game right? 

Like how about you try learn about how to fight a champion before complaining in fact I'm pretty sure that the fact he was mord give you a chance. Since if that was a darius or renekton that fed you would of lost Much faster.

Please don't say a champion is op when he is fed since it means nothing.

I swear to God Mordekaiser is terrible. he's literally AP Garen, completely shutdown by anti-healing items, only relevant if he gets ahead.

All you have to do to beat this garbage champion is not die, which is incredibly easy as his E is;
1. easy to dodge
2. on a 24 / 21 / 18 / 15 / 12 second cooldown (way too long to be good)

His ultimate is essentially his only relevant spell and even that is only relevant if he gets ahead.
If you are losing to this champion, it is because your top laner fed him. You should really never lose to Morde if you're laning against him, he sucks

I seriously don't understand how people have so much trouble with Morde, almost every time I've vsed him it's been a free win.

Mordekaiser is simply very strong right now because of new conqueror synergy. This demands his opponents to build grievous wounds, treating him as a Mundo or a Vlad, and most people haven't caught up with that yet. 

He's surely overpowered at the moment, but a rune is at fault. Changing his numbers will solve the problem but tie Morde's viability to conqueror state. 

About the kit, the frustrating points are the lack of counterplay when ulted or permaslowed by Rylai, and that's it.

I'd rather go against morde at any time rather than facing scum like: {{champion:8}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:98}}
